```js
name: CI/CD
on:
  - push
jobs:
# add jobs here
```

```js
jobs:
  # previous jobs
  e2e:
    name: E2E Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      - run: mv .env.example .env
      - uses: cypress-io/github-action@v4
        with:
          build: npm run build
          start: npm run start
```
